column5: we are planning our fall trip to the red this fall.is there a good hydrographic map avaible for the lockport to netley area?also for the winnipeg river from pine falls to traverse bay area.

The only one that I could find for the Red River was at the link below:http://www.canadamapsales.com/ The don't have an 'angling map' however they do have a boating chart that shows not only navidational aids but also the various depths. As well, they have a lot of good maps of many other lakes and rivers in Manitoba. To get the Red River boating map you have to call their phone number and order it because its not listed on the website. "Hold on to the boat, boys, she's gonna ram us!"
